def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoObjeto from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState
form = widget.ProviderWidget if form == None: return registro = form.Entity if registro == None: return
handle = registro.Fields["HANDLE"].Value widget.Hidden = CNContratoObjeto.RequisicoesCompraOcultarTab(handle)
